meanings.definition: A type of Italian cookie or biscuit.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat a biscotto with my tea in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pack of biscotti from the bakery for the party.
meanings.sent3: The biscotto jumped out of the jar and rolled away!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly baked biscotto filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's homemade biscotti are the best I've ever tasted.

meanings.definition: A type of twice-baked bread or toast.
meanings.sent1: The crunchy biscotto was perfect for dipping in coffee.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed a slice of biscotto with butter for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The biscotto was so hard, it could break a tooth!
meanings.sent4: The golden brown biscotto reminded her of a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The biscotto crumbled in his hand, leaving a trail of crumbs.
